name: Endless Match-3
description:
A endless match-3 puzzle video game developed with Lua language and LOVE framework. It has no score, so it endless and you can`t win or loose. Game has only mouse control. Installer contains MESA OpenGL implementataion for old hardware compability.  Source code licensed under MIT license. Game asserts licensed under CC-BY 3.0 License.

Credits

  • Downdate for cartoon sky texture licensed under CC-BY 3.0 License
  • GameArtForge for gem sprite set licensed under CC-BY 3.0 License
  • Frederico Dossena for MESA 3D for Windows (software render to OpenGL applications).
  • Nullsoft company for Nullsoft Scriptable Install System
  • Authors of LOVE framework
